title: Acupuncture | Lifestyle Wellness
cleaned_text: Chiropractic + Integrative Medicine ACUPUNCTURE Holistic Acupuncture At Lifestyle Wellness, we offer Integrative Acupuncture: - Traditional Chinese Acupuncture - Naturopathic Medicine - Ear Seeds - Energy Healing - Herbs All focusing on achieving each patient's health and wellness naturally. Why Acupuncture? Acupuncture is a form of healing therapy that activates the body's own healing ability to rebalance & restore itself naturally. Our integrated acupuncture uses a time-honored, safe, medically substantiated method to help patients become pain-free, achieve healthy weight, heal and rejuvenate their system. Although still regarded as an alternative therapy, acupuncture is highly praised throughout the medical community for its effectiveness and lack of negative side effects. Acupuncture has been known to successfully treat many acute & chronic illnesses that Western medicine had trouble treating effectively. Conditions We Treat Cosmetic Acupuncture Cosmetic Acupuncture offers a non-toxic method for skin restoration and facial rejuvenation. It offers an unintrusive alternative to plastic surgery as well as an effective procedure presiding plastic surgery to maximize the outcome and post surgery to speed up the recovery and maintenance. It is also very effective as a quick 30 minute mini facial to bring radiance back after a hard day of work. There are no scars and it isn't painful.
